attributes.action: ignore all petitions calling on the government to restrict our rights any further.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are an aweful lot of petitions on the site which call for the government to meddle in our affairs even further. For example, one petition calls for ciggerettes to be banned, another for towns to be barred from putting up christmas decorations prior to the 1st of december. We feel it is not the governments job to legislate on such matters.

This is, in effect, a counter petition covering most of the site.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
